channel.title: You got banned? WE DONT CARE dont post about it
channel.description:
If your going to cheat your going to get banned, its a fact of life, dont post about it anymore.
any new posts will be deleted

item.title: You got banned? WE DONT CARE dont post about it
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

When JDB went on his rampage this was deleted, Moparisthebest then probably got all the old posts back but probably didnt know which ones were stickied before. That plus the fact this thread isn’t needed anymore.

This was mainly around the time that Aryan was about and Jagex were performing a lot of mass bannings. I am going to lock this so nobody else bumps with “Why was this unstickied”.

Read full topic

item.title: You got banned? WE DONT CARE dont post about it
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

sanga282:

well games moderator go ahead

Haha I don’t think I was moderator of this section when I posted that. Don’t really need to sticky this as we hardly get any butt hurt b& people posting.

Though if I do see an influx of people like that I wont hesitate to stick this again.

Don’t ya just love to bump topics? Any reason for chipping this one off apart from some people know about it?

EDIT: I also miss this stick for some reason lol… nearly each board has a sticky, why not this one!

Actually i’d like to see this stickied again.

BINGO![/quote]
